c169aee0-af2b-47a4-a51e-9acaceca72c0.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Intro to Shopbot class at the Somerville Fab Lab. The earner has a foundational understanding of the Shopbot Buddy, safety and setup guidelines for proper tool usage, and knows how to set up a file in VCarve Pro. The earner is certified to use this tool at the Somerville Fab Lab.
c169aee0-af2b-47a4-a51e-9acaceca72c0.name: Shopbot Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Intro to Shopbot class at the Somerville Fab Lab.

c12d7374-dcf2-4815-8948-a725edf9b436.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Intro to Lasercutter class at the Somerville Fab Lab. The earner has a basic understanding of the Epilog Mini lasercutter, basic safety guidelines (including ventilation and fire safety), and knows how to set up a file to cut. This badge certifies the earner to use this tool at the Somerville Fab Lab.
c12d7374-dcf2-4815-8948-a725edf9b436.name: Lasercutter Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Intro to Lasercutter class at the Somerville Fab Lab.

8288f7f6-b3b4-4931-aca2-ce5740e543cb.description: The earner of this badge understands the basic principles of Canva as a visual design tool. The earner is able to navigate a new graphic design interface, earn valuable new design skills and take new leaps to learn about up-and-coming technology. The earner can work with fonts and colors and create a work product with layout and alignmen.
8288f7f6-b3b4-4931-aca2-ce5740e543cb.name: Canva Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Graphic Design Workshop

15214f26-57c4-41c1-810e-e3383f10efbe.description: The earner of this badge has a fundamental understanding of how the fast-growing science of genetics and genomics impacts society and their lives. The earner understands terminology and basic concepts surrounding DNA, genes, and genetics and explored how genetics impact identity and ancestry. The earner can access popular genealogy websites and data providers to understand what they tell you, and what they don’t tell you. Further, the earner can assess health-related DNA claims.
15214f26-57c4-41c1-810e-e3383f10efbe.name: Genetic Literacy SkillUp Somerville Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in the Genetic Literacy SkillUp Somerville Workshop
They attended the workshop

skills.name: Google Cloud Platform And G Suite

75147152-7a8b-4a7f-b0eb-890ffd434c27.name: Social Media Basics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete

9a1b3034-55b6-4807-8d0e-9d562b664ea7.description: The earner of this badge is certified to use this tool at the Somerville Fab Lab. The earner is able to design a 3D model in Tinkercad or Fusion360, export the model to Simplify3D or a comparable slicer program, set parameters for filament material (ABS vs. PLA), set parameters for supports, rafts, and layer height, export and print file to Flashforge 3D printer.
9a1b3034-55b6-4807-8d0e-9d562b664ea7.name: 3D Printer Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Intro to 3D Printing class at the Somerville Fab Lab.

5ba18005-9d98-4ee8-a76f-1b9abcba94cb.description: Everything you wanted to know about Podcast but were afraid to ask! Did you know that you can create a podcast at Somerville Media Center? In this brief lecture, students will gain some useful tips & tricks for podcast production and you'll also meet other podcast producers!
5ba18005-9d98-4ee8-a76f-1b9abcba94cb.name: Podcast Production Info Session

badge_template_activities.title: Following the class people must fill out the class survey

23d4eb6e-01fa-4efd-86ba-3e7e84926cb2.description: The earner of this badge completed the Intro to Vinyl Cutting Course at the Somerville Fab Lab. the earner has a basic understanding of vector graphics and digital fabrication technology. The earner can open a digital file in Roland Cut Pro, trace a bitmap image, load and set size for plastic adhesive, and cut a sticker on the Roland Vinyl Cutter.
23d4eb6e-01fa-4efd-86ba-3e7e84926cb2.name: Vinyl Cutter Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Intro to Vinyl Cutting Course

592837c7-066b-4d33-add2-114a5d77ea40.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Introduction to Javascript class at the Somerville Fab Lab.The earner has a basic understanding of computer programming using P5JS, and can create a new program using the P5JS web editor, run code using basic program syntax (setup and draw functions), use color, fill, stroke, and shapes to draw and animate to the screen, use variables, loops, and conditionals to iterate changing states of code and use the P5JS reference library to troubleshoot.
592837c7-066b-4d33-add2-114a5d77ea40.name: Javascript Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to Javascript class at the Somerville Fab Lab.

06d7fec5-e0eb-4cb2-a7ce-66ce781ba5ff.description: The earner has completed a course in digital field camera operation through the Somerville Media Center. The earner understands the basic concepts and practice of digital photography, including the use of the camera, lenses, and other basic photographic equipment. The earner is aware of aesthetic principles as they relate to composition, space, exposure, light and color.
06d7fec5-e0eb-4cb2-a7ce-66ce781ba5ff.name: Digital Camera

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course in digital field camera operation through the Somerville Media Center.

664d4aeb-8472-4390-ae11-6f63666ebe1b.description: Students from this workshop will leave with a better understanding of basic features and functions of your smartphone, top apps to consider, how to best utilize your camera features, how to share media from your phone, privacy settings, and a better grasp on the basics of getting connected to WiFi.
664d4aeb-8472-4390-ae11-6f63666ebe1b.name: How to Navigate your Smartphone

badge_template_activities.title: They attended the workshop

e9e25f5c-c36b-4ef8-837a-8463f1a64536.description: New to Mailchimp and not sure where to start? We’ll walk you through the basics so you know what to expect along the way.
e9e25f5c-c36b-4ef8-837a-8463f1a64536.name: Intro to Mailchimp

badge_template_activities.title: They attended the workshop

2f51f743-3222-4479-a6b5-c9df5d6dce13.description: This badge is part of the Somerville Fab Lab badge series. The earner knows the basics of how static web sites are constructed, interpreted, and hosted using HTML and CSS and how dynamic websites are created using server-side software and data. Using both Django and Python, the earner can write, share, and deploy projects.
2f51f743-3222-4479-a6b5-c9df5d6dce13.name: Intro to Web Programming: Django and Python

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Intro to Web Programming through Somerville Fab Lab.

3cda33fa-94fb-493f-b5a2-1b696a21ada8.description: The earner of this badge has completed a course designed to give people an introduction to micro-controllers and syntax based computer programming. The earner has a foundational understanding of coding, sensors, and interactive design with interactive electronic objects. This badge is part of the Somerville Fab Lab badge series.
3cda33fa-94fb-493f-b5a2-1b696a21ada8.name: Arduino Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to the Arduino class at the Somerville Fab Lab.

46582892-f537-4a2d-9695-ca42e68960b4.description: The earner of this badge is authorized to use the Black Cat Labs Laser cutter. This badge is part of the Somerville Fab Lab badge series.
46582892-f537-4a2d-9695-ca42e68960b4.name: BCL laser cutter

badge_template_activities.title: Complete basic training on the Black Cat Labs Laser cutter.

71487ef1-ce3b-484a-b8ec-2fbcdf5eea8d.description: The earner of this badge is a member of The Innovation and Opportunity Lab, a volunteer committee dedicated to building and inclusive innovation ecosystem model, one that provides economic opportunities for all Somerville residents. Members assist with research and make recommendations on innovative policies and practices that create opportunities for economic mobility, or which provide a benefit to traditionally marginalized or underrepresented communities.
71487ef1-ce3b-484a-b8ec-2fbcdf5eea8d.name: Innovation Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Be a member of the Innovation and Opportunity Lab

d47896c9-1f94-45b5-8f09-306a67f78717.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Micro:bit Professional Development at the Somerville Fab Lab. The earner has a basic understanding of block-based computer programming and open hardware. The earner can open the Javascript Blocks editor and create a file in MakeCode, use input and output functions (LEDs array, button press, pin touch, etc), use logic functions (if statements, loops, and conditionals), and download and test a program on the Micro:bit board.
d47896c9-1f94-45b5-8f09-306a67f78717.name: Microbit PD

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Micro:bit Professional Development at the Somerville Fab Lab.

6d430335-1180-44a2-a404-cfdd3366b14c.description: During this two hour workshop you will learn how to create your own website in Wix. Learn to navigate; make pages and posts; add photos; and customize the appearance of your website. Students will also explore how to create contact forms, custom menus, photo galleries, how to add additional users and integrate social media on your website.
6d430335-1180-44a2-a404-cfdd3366b14c.name: Build Your Own Website with Wix

badge_template_activities.title: The beginning stages of creating a Wix website.

1b4c5758-6815-46b1-a216-903629bab3ce.description: Instagram can be a powerful tool for engagement with customers, clients and the public in general. This workshop will go over the benefits of an Instagram Professional Account, debunking myths about the algorithm, posting strategies, analytics and other features.
1b4c5758-6815-46b1-a216-903629bab3ce.name: Instagram for Nonprofits and Small Business

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully attended SMC Digital Literacy Course.

742834bb-e446-435d-80f0-85539e89c620.description: The earner of this badge in an educator who has completed the Lasercutter Professional Development at the Somerville Fab Lab. The earner has a basic understanding of the Epilog Mini lasercutter, including tool certification and an understanding of applications for digital fabrication in the classroom.
742834bb-e446-435d-80f0-85539e89c620.name: Lasercutter PD

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Lasercutter Professional Development at the Somerville Fab Lab.

edbdbc2a-b5cf-4131-ba94-1987b3c1d045.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Introduction to the BBC Micro:bit class at the Somerville Fab Lab. The earner has a basic understanding of block-based computer programming and open hardware. The earner can open the Javascript Blocks editor and create a file in MakeCode, use input and output functions (LEDs array, button press, pin touch, etc), use logic functions (if statements, loops, and conditionals), and download and test a program on the Micro:bit board
edbdbc2a-b5cf-4131-ba94-1987b3c1d045.name: Microbit Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to the BBC Micro:bit class at the Somerville Fab Lab.

3916198d-c393-4ee6-965c-7937b0520d8c.description: Are you curious about your family’s history? Are you not sure where to get started? Join Somerville Public Library Local History Librarian Kevin O’Kelly for a virtual introduction to online genealogy. He’ll introduce you to basic strategies and principles and teach you about online resources available from the Somerville Public Library and the federal government as well other Internet resources. This class is in collaboration with the Somerville Public Library.
3916198d-c393-4ee6-965c-7937b0520d8c.name: Online Genealogy for Beginners

badge_template_activities.title: Participant in "Online Genealogy for Beginners" offered by Somerville Media Center and Somerville Public Library
